content.raw:
I implemented duplicate name checking in 52dc7c6.

You can have same variables within a container (they are in different plots) but you cannot have same variable within a multi-variable pill.

Name checking is done against the name of the variable when its first dragged in from the left palette - this is assumed to be unique. Users are free to edit the variable pill text later and it won't affect the unique name.
content.html:
I implemented duplicate name checking in 52dc7c6.

You can have same variables within a container (they are in different plots) but you cannot have same variable within a multi-variable pill.

Name checking is done against the name of the variable when its first dragged in from the left palette - this is assumed to be unique. Users are free to edit the variable pill text later and it won't affect the unique name.
